about_the_game:
This is a magical themed card battle game where you will use certain strategies to maximize the use of your hand resources. Winning the final boss through battle. In card battles, you can hold weapons and wear equipment to deal with various enemies with different strengths and weaknesses. Smart players will ultimately defeat them through strategies.

Game mechanics

There is a protagonist card in the game, and the game ends when the protagonist's health is zero. Use the protagonist to shoot the cards that collide with the playing area and interact with different cards in the playing area. When there is only one card in the playing area, three consecutive cards will be played. Cards can be placed in the backpack area, mount area, and handheld area of the game. These areas can only hold cards of the corresponding type, and cards in these areas cannot interact with each other. The handheld area can directly throw weapons to defeat enemies and also serve as a temporary storage card. In the game, you will encounter treasure chests, which can be opened by double clicking on ordinary treasure chests. The precious treasure chest needs to be opened through key interaction. Some foods cannot directly restore the protagonist's health value and need to be broken through with weapons. Unleashing imagination in the game can achieve twice the result with half the effort.

Game Features

There are various card interactions in the game, which are very rich. Bringing players many novel gaming experiences. However, winning the game still requires a certain strategy. How to utilize the cards in hand and maximize the mechanism of the game is something that players need to think about. The strategic nature of the game is also a major highlight. The overall difficulty is moderate, and it is a design that players can easily complete by thinking about it. The key is to let players experience the joy of solving problems.

Overall level

The game consists of different levels, each with a boss and their corresponding deck. Defeating the boss will earn rewards. Passing all levels completes the game. All levels are not linear, players can freely choose and progress step by step. Each level has its own unique characteristics. Placing the corresponding card in the position area can switch levels, provided that the boss is defeated first.

Background of the story

In the distant mythological era, the chaos of heaven and earth began to bloom, and Huaguo Mountain emerged as a mysterious and spiritual paradise. A spirit monkey emerged from a rock, with bright eyes, agile posture, and innate extraordinary courage and wisdom. This is the Monkey King who later shook the world: Sun WuKong! Come and join the world of Monkey King Birth, become a card master, witness the birth of Monkey King, and write your own legendary chapter!

name: Card Survival: WuKong Is Born

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: X64 or X86
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a Journey to the West themed card battle game with Sun Wukong as the protagonist. You will use certain strategies to maximize the use of your hand resources. Come and join the world of "WuKong Is Born", become a card master!
